title: Elizabeth Taylor
description: Over the years Elizabeth Taylor has matured from the appealing, fresh-faced young girl of "National Velvet" to the powerful, sensitive actress of "Suddenly Last Summer" and "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?". Foster Hirsch's book is both a thoughtful appraisal of her more than forty films and a tribute, in one hundred striking photographs, to one of the screen's most beautiful women.
author: Foster Hirsch
